posts.description:
Apple Inc. reported that every year a new 150+ million user buy iPhone and iPad, and this is considered a potential market for iPhone and iPad Apps developers .

It's time to start your business and make money !

Start your own mobile App business and make money by creating your own iOS application and upload it to the App store to be available for download globally.

posts.message:
السلام عليكم
Does anyone know how to implement a feature like "Track Text Changes" in Word
so we have a question & the user will answer that question but at a later time he will change this answer (add/remove words)
& we need to highlight the changes made using asp.Net MVC
& thanks in advance

posts.caption: koding.com
posts.description: Koding is a developer community and cloud development environment where developers come together and code in the browser – with a real development server to run their code. Developers can work, collaborate, write and run apps without jumping through hoops and spending unnecessary money.
